mapper.update: update stock_master set id = #{id}, code = #{code}, units = #{units}, mbflag = #{mbflag}, lastcurcostdate = #{lastcurcostdate}, actualcost = #{actualcost}, lastcost = #{lastcost}, materialcost = #{materialcost}, labourcost = #{labourcost}, overheadcost = #{overheadcost}, lowestlevel = #{lowestlevel}, discontinued = #{discontinued}, controlled = #{controlled}, eoq = #{eoq}, volume = #{volume}, kgs = #{kgs}, barcode = #{barcode}, discountcategory = #{discountcategory}, taxcatid = #{taxcatid}, serialised = #{serialised}, appendfile = #{appendfile}, perishable = #{perishable}, decimalplaces = #{decimalplaces}, nextserialno = #{nextserialno}, pansize = #{pansize}, shrinkfactor = #{shrinkfactor} where id = #{id};
